name: Vs Firey Recoded
description:
THIS RECHART IS TOO POG!!

---

Authors:

FireyTheFlame -Original Mod author

Sackboy62320 -Recharted, Dialogue Editor, Bug Fixer, Modchart Remover

---

Original Story:

Face off against the season 1 winner himself, BFDI's very own Firey!

One day, BF and GF were just strolling around town, then something mysterious happened. A portal had opened in the nearby area where they were and it sucked them in! When they awoke, they saw a strange entity they haven't seen before. A living fire named Firey. I'm sure we all know what happens next.

This is a full week mod that I spent a good handful of days making and editing together, from making custom character poses to charting every single song for all 3 difficulties, so I hope you all enjoy playing this!

Firey and BFDI is made and owned by Jacknjellify on YouTube. This is a fan creation that I have had as an idea for a long while now, and thanks to Psych Engine's easy to understand creation tools, this mod was possible!
